pullrequest.title: Bullet should update contact information if the physics engine is disabled

content.raw:
Sure, just added one. This test fails if you comment the conditional part in BulletPhysics::UpdatePhysics().

It's just two spheres which collide and must have at least one contact point.

The test is disabled for DART until the same fixes for DART are added later on (after dart-6 is merged)
content.html:
Sure, just added one. This test fails if you comment the conditional part in BulletPhysics::UpdatePhysics().

It's just two spheres which collide and must have at least one contact point.
